00051 int ast_privacy_check(char *dest, char *cid)
00052 {
00053    char tmp[256] = "";
00054    char *trimcid = "";
00055    char *n, *l;
00056    int res;
00057    char key[256], result[256];
00058    if (cid)
00059       ast_copy_string(tmp, cid, sizeof(tmp));
00060    ast_callerid_parse(tmp, &n, &l);
00061    if (l) {
00062       ast_shrink_phone_number(l);
00063       trimcid = l;
00064    }
00065    snprintf(key, sizeof(key), "%s/%s", dest, trimcid);
00066    res = ast_db_get("privacy", key, result, sizeof(result));
00067    if (!res) {
00068       if (!strcasecmp(result, "allow"))
00069          return AST_PRIVACY_ALLOW;
00070       if (!strcasecmp(result, "deny"))
00071          return AST_PRIVACY_DENY;
00072       if (!strcasecmp(result, "kill"))
00073          return AST_PRIVACY_KILL;
00074       if (!strcasecmp(result, "torture"))
00075          return AST_PRIVACY_TORTURE;
00076    }
00077    return AST_PRIVACY_UNKNOWN;
00078 }
00079 
00080 int ast_privacy_reset(char *dest)
00081 {
00082    if (!dest)
00083       return -1;
00084    return ast_db_deltree("privacy", dest);
00085 }
00086 
00087 int ast_privacy_set(char *dest, char *cid, int status)
00088 {
00089    char tmp[256] = "";
00090    char *trimcid = "";
00091    char *n, *l;
00092    int res;
00093    char key[256];
00094    if (cid)
00095       ast_copy_string(tmp, cid, sizeof(tmp));
00096    ast_callerid_parse(tmp, &n, &l);
00097    if (l) {
00098       ast_shrink_phone_number(l);
00099       trimcid = l;
00100    }
00101    if (ast_strlen_zero(trimcid)) {
00102       /* Don't store anything for empty Caller*ID */
00103       return 0;
00104    }
00105    snprintf(key, sizeof(key), "%s/%s", dest, trimcid);
00106    if (status == AST_PRIVACY_UNKNOWN) 
00107       res = ast_db_del("privacy", key);
00108    else if (status == AST_PRIVACY_ALLOW)
00109       res = ast_db_put("privacy", key, "allow");
00110    else if (status == AST_PRIVACY_DENY)
00111       res = ast_db_put("privacy", key, "deny");
00112    else if (status == AST_PRIVACY_KILL)
00113       res = ast_db_put("privacy", key, "kill");
00114    else if (status == AST_PRIVACY_TORTURE)
00115       res = ast_db_put("privacy", key, "torture");
00116    else
00117       res = -1;
00118    return res;
00119 }
